title: UEX 2.0 Price sync complete!
message: Price syncing scripts have now been updated to work with [UEX's new API 2.0](https://uexcorp.space). Price syncing will now resume as normal on a regular schedule (hourly-ish).

title: Account Verification DISABLED until further notice
message: [CIG announced on spectrum](https://robertsspaceindustries.com/spectrum/community/SC/forum/50259/thread/why-rsi-profile-pages-are-now-gated-behind-login/6858872) that they have disabled public accounts and so Regolith cannot verify your handle until further notice. We very much hope that this is temporary.
